tests

Class CompanyTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.CompanyTest

  • public class CompanyTest
extends java.lang.Object
    A few tests on the company components : departments, managers and employees The goal is to attest the coherence of the structures' behavior with the initial instructions
    Author:
    Charles MECHERIKI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompanyTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialization()
      Initializes the environment for the different tests
      void testAddExistingDepartment_companyStructureExceptionThrown()
      Add a department to the company which already exists : impossible, a CompanyStructureException is thrown
      void testAssignHeadManagerAsEmployee_companyStructureExceptionThrown()
      Assign an head manager as an employee of another department : impossible, CompanyStructureException thrown
      void testAssignHeadManagerAsHeadManager_replacesCurrentManager()
      Assign an head manager as head manager of another department : his new assignment prioritize on his current position, he will replace the current department active manager and leave his current position
      void testAssignManagerAsHeadManager_replacesCurrentManager()
      Assign a manager as head manager of another department : this manager should no longer be part of his ex department, and should replace the current head manager of the department
      void testDemoteHeadManager_companyStructureExceptionThrown()
      Demote a head manager : impossible, CompanyStructureException thrown
      void testDemoteManager_managerIsNowEmployee()
      Demote a manager : he is now an employee
      void testDismissEmployeeAlreadyDismissed_companyStructureExceptionThrown()
      Dismiss an employee who is already dismissed : impossible, a CompanyStructureException is thrown
      void testDismissEmployeeFromCompany_employeeNoLongerInCompany()
      Dismiss an employee from the company : this employee is no longer in his department and the company
      void testDismissHeadManagerFromCompany_companyStructureExceptionThrown()
      Dismiss a head manager : this is not allowed, a CompanyStructureException is thrown
      void testPromoteEmployee_employeeIsNowManager()
      Promote an employee to manager : he is now a manager (in the company and his department) he will replace the current department active manager and leave his current position

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
